post:
VEEBLE (www.veeble.org)

Veeble offers versatile web services including Virtual Private Servers, dedicated servers, remote desktop solutions and web hosting. To add with, we weave a closer and reliable web with services complementing the fastest technology. We offer affordable 24x7 managed services that promises a worry free hosting for you.


Introducing MultiVPS Linux & Windows, to get more than a VPS.

» CREATE & DELETE VPS
You can deploy Servers anytime from the Client Zone using the available resources. You can also delete the Servers without any hassles.

» EASY SCALING
You can easily scale the resources of the Server anytime from your Client Zone.

» ANYBODY CAN DO IT
No advanced technical knowledge needed for server creation/deletion. Free Basic Management included in all servers.

» LINUX & WINDOWS
You can deploy VPS with both Linux and Windows Operating Systems readily available in the control panel. There are no separate license charges for Windows Operating Systems.
